casebody.data:
William Herbert et al. v. Frederick Smyth et al.

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Cotter and Ryan, Js.

Argued May 13 decided May 21, 1969 Walter M. Pickett, Jr., for the appellants (defendants). Robert J. Sullivan, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Per Curiam.

The trial court followed the rescript as set forth in Herbert v. Smyth, 155 Conn. 78, 86, 230 A.2d 235.

There is no error.
